page.title: 10Alderbrook Junior School
page.content: School starts at 9.oÂ£clock with one of the upper form pupils ringing the bell. First we have assembly where the whole school is gathered together,usually to listen to a story and also to have notics about the weekÂ£s happeningÂ£s. After,all the classes go back into their classrooms and have set lessons. Our class usually has mathematics,in which we split into four groups. Then we have a break of fifteen minutes.We play netball and football and there is always a teacher on duty in the playground.After break we have topic;this termÂ£s topic is about Edwardian times. We carry on until twelve noon when we have dinner.We line up in the hall and collect a tray and knives and forks, then get our food and sit down.
